page.title: 10GILDERSOME-AMENITIES.
page.content: {Gildersome village,situated 4 miles SW Leeds,1mile NW Morley;population-9000. There are 2 J&I schools,Birchfield and Gildersome.Both schools are of Semi- open Plan Design,with large grassed playing areas.Total no.of pupils:500; Classes-18;Teachers-22. {Amenities: 3 pubs,4 clubs(Cricket, Conservative,Liberal,Working Men's),3 fish & chip shops,1 library & meeting hall,1 health centre,2 service garages 3 non-food shops,1 DIY shop,3 churches ,2 Building Societies,1 betting shop, 1 laundrette, 1 bank,10 food shops, 1 home for OAP's, 1 Post Office & Bakery,1 public toilet,most houses post-war,2 new housing estates.The village has 1 very small park and a recreation ground containing 2 full sized soccer pitches.People would like a cafe,a larger park and more facilities for 11-16 year olds.
